title: Things i expect for Diana IN 2018 (RIOT THIS IS FOR YOU)
body:
https://i.imgur.com/X46B7du.jpg
This is an ALL ABOUT DIANA THREAD so Before you start Reading this know that in this post are **MY OWN PERSONAL** opinions about Diana and the improvements** I BELIEVE** she needs to get to her full potential as a Great champion and not just an 1 shot machine with Amazing splash arts
  
So..., According to the new video Released by Riot the lead Producer states that Riot Listens Closely to our Feedback and they love to see feedback from players who play the game on a massive scale so as a devoted Diana main here are my 2 cents **(Hoping Riot will Read this)**

Okay so first things first because i don't want bore you with a very long text In the beginning am gonna outline everything one by one so you can have some basic idea of the topic that will be discussed

First and foremost am going to start this out by saying this **"Riot you need to seriously pay some attention to Diana and fix these issues i outline below"**

1. _**A MASSIVE MASSIVE MASSIVE UPDATE TO THE IN GAME MODELS ( I'll explain below why with some proof )** _
2. New voice-lines and Taunts with Leona Taric and Pantheon and other Champions
3. Bring Moonflair Spellblade Into Summoners Rift {{item:3170}} 
4. Revert Her Ult and her Shield DMG back to when Diana was released and buff Her Passive by 5% => (You are buffing Yasuo RIOT so you have **no excuse** on this)
5. Make her Ult have **AOE DMG** 
6. **(This is a BIG TOPIC)** Since Diana's W (Her shield) is the only defensive mechanism she has available and nothing else make it so that the more enemy champions you have nearby you the higher the **AP RATIO OF THE SHIELD AND DMG GETS** Or just have the CD of the ability start when i press E not when all orbs Detonate 
_=> I'll elaborate further down this thread as to why this needs to become a thing (But if you are a Diana main you already know why)_
7. A Chibi figure to the store along site some Merch like other champions have
8. A Diana Emote (Because Reasons)
9. A Legendary and Project Skin   

>THE REASONS I BELIEVE THE IN GAME MODELS NEED TO BE UPDATED **(PROOF)**

This is PROOF of how much attention Riot Gives to Diana
(I bet my life on the fact that they haven't updated anything on Diana since 2012)
**Keep in mind am talking about the quality of the 3D IN GAME MODEL HERE**
https://i.imgur.com/oSLBh0Q.png
https://i.imgur.com/YzIb6QL.png
^^^ **In these 2 i cant even see her eyes (Can you?)**
https://i.imgur.com/eDky3Hh.png
https://i.imgur.com/mYEmgeo.png
https://i.imgur.com/9LOC2gY.png
https://i.imgur.com/I6M0TWM.png
https://i.imgur.com/0khjKBi.png
https://i.imgur.com/zhEM1jw.png
https://i.imgur.com/KIswAJd.png
Riot what the hell is this?
https://i.imgur.com/FICQRs4.png
https://i.imgur.com/45RwvWB.png

**Riot lets be true to one another for a moment here 
We this (Pictures Above) IN GAME content you mean to tell me that A MULTI BILLION DOLLAR COMPANY AND THE #1 MOST PLAYED GAME IN THE WORLD CANT Deliver Better Quality then this? (SERIOUSLY?)**

And am just BARELY scratching the surface here Am not even going to mention 
other body parts or other stances and the fact that she has ZERO facial expressions because i don't want to overfill this post

BTW here are some examples of GREAT 3D MODELS i found online 
https://i.imgur.com/j22cfks.jpg 
^(Look how clean this looks compare to yours Riot?)
https://i.imgur.com/B3WP0lj.jpg 
(In the lore it says she has the PUREST white hair so the creator might went with that in mind) 
https://i.imgur.com/brbGMZh.jpg 
(This looks like an HD version of the Original skin)

And before you say anything i will just post this
 
New champion Zoe looks CLEAN in comparison to Dianas 3D models 
and this is just the BETA VERSION **AND SHE ALSO HAS FACIAL EXPRESSIONS** 
https://i.imgur.com/gQALQt7.png

So yeah i DO BELIEVE she needs a heavy Duty **IN GAME UPDATE**

> **THE SHIELD UPDATE**

So this topic i believe needs to be addressed because its super frustrating when you main a champion such as Diana that she Is an all in Do or Die champion and you want to kill the ADC in the LATE GAME Team-fight and all the enemy Team Dives you and you have nothing to protect yourself with i mean think about it every other champion in League has some sort of escape like Jump ,Wall, Freeze, Stun or something Diana Has NOTHING she's just an 1 SHOT BURST ASSASSIN that goes in to clear out as many champions as she can and that's it so am like "am okay with that BUT give me something i can sustain myself in 1vs5 situations that i ulted the ADC and the whole team appeared for the bush and i cant escape" 
So i figured
**LOWER THE COOL-DOWN AND SCALE THE AP RATIO OF HER SHIELD BASED ON HOW MANY ENEMIES YOU HAVE AROUND YOU WHILE OR BEFORE I USE MY SHIELD OR MAKE THE CD START ONCE I ACTIVATED THE ABILITY NOT WHEN ALL SPHERES DETONATE** 
Think about it 
Diana is a Diver at her core with no escape abilities (No windwalls no Tornado no Shields building up while doing the most basic thing in the game "moving" NOTHING) just one shield and that's it
So according to my thinking and my humble experience with Diana that's the perfect solution i can figure out for her with her current kit

> **LASTLY A MESSAGE FOR RIOT **

Please take into concentration what i just outlined here as my overall opinion as a 400k Diana MAIN AND UNDERSTAND THAT DIANA AS A CHAMPION HAS TREMENDOUS POTENTIAL and also PLEASE if you are gong to Create a Legendary skin for Diana {{champion:131}} please do an event Like Riven and Yasuo had and have Leona {{champion:89}} as her Rival :) 
https://i.imgur.com/z6p07FB.jpg

SOLAR Eclipse Diana

LUNAR Eclipse Leona
https://i.imgur.com/kN27gKs.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/w2NRnGi.jpg 
**( OPEN THE IMAGE AND CLICK ON IT TO ZOOM IN AND LET THE MAGIC UNFOLD )**

> Thnx for Reading guys.

No no no please, old Diana main here too. Diana isn't an AP assassin, she's an AP diver. She shouldn't be able to go in and escape, that's her entire job to engage (same as Xin Zhao).

A thought that I had for a long time, maybe if her Q hits more than one person and she dashes with her R, a similar effect to her E gets triggered. Remove her E, and make a new spell out of it (I played her for a long time during last seasons, and I always started levelling E after level 6). Maybe, give her E working the same as Aurelion Sol W (you know, enhancing his passive damage / range), that would be toggled on / off, giving AS and more range for her AA, with a mana cost per attack and an increased range. It would help her cleaning the jungle, and also not making her Nashor's tooth dependant.

Just my thoughts tho, Diana's probably my favourite champ in the game

Also, I do agree that she looks ugly as fuck, even her skins. The only one I think is decent is the Blood moon one (because we don't see her inexpressive face probably). I'm gonna keep the last pictures you posted tho
